00032 #define tds_sysdep_int16_type short     /* 16-bit int */
00033 #define tds_sysdep_int32_type int       /* 32-bit int */

00037 #if !defined(WIN64) && !defined(_WIN64)
00038 #define tds_sysdep_intptr_type int      /* 32-bit int */
00039 #else

00042 typedef SOCKET TDS_SYS_SOCKET;
00043 #ifndef TDS_IS_SOCKET_INVALID
00044 #define TDS_IS_SOCKET_INVALID(s) ((s) == INVALID_SOCKET)
00045 #endif

00049 #endif
